name: Diccionario panhispánico de dudas
description: Diccionario panhispánico de dudas (DPD) provides clear and reasoned answers to the most frequent doubts about the use of Spanish today, on topics ranging from pronunciation, accentuation, punctuation, spelling, morphology, syntax, and lexical-semantic issues.
owner_name: Real Academia Española y Asociación de Academias de la Lengua Española
